greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First order recursion: a(0)=2; a(n) = prime(n) - a(n-1).
comment: Observe relationship: a(n-1) + a(n) = prime(n), the n-th prime;
It follows also that a(n+1)-a(n-1) = A001223(n).
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {my(last = 2, new, v=vector(nn)); for (n=1, nn, v[n] = prime(n) - last; last = v[n];); v;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 27 2020
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 23 2003
